title: Big Tobacco Heralds a Healthier World While Fighting Its Arrival
description: The industry continues to fight efforts to restrict certain products, like spending heavily to urge California voters to overturn a law banning tobacco flavors.
dc:creator: Julie Creswell and Matt Richtel
media:description: The fight shaping up over government restrictions on menthol and nicotine highlights the longstanding resistance of the tobacco industry to regulations, despite corporate claims of support for a smokeless alternative.
